label: Schedule
comment: A series of planned activities or things to be done showing the times or dates when they are intended to happen or be done.

datatypeProperties.comment: A textual description of this supply chain schedule.
An identifier of this supply chain schedule.
A date, time, date time, or other date time of an occurrence in this supply chain schedule.
A code specifying the status of this supply chain schedule.
A code specifying the type of supply chain schedule.

referencedBy.comment: A supply chain consumption schedule, at line level, for this trade delivery.
A supply chain delivery schedule, at line level, for this trade delivery.
A supply chain despatch schedule, at line level, for this trade delivery.
A supply chain order schedule, at line level, for this trade delivery.
A supply chain receipt schedule, at line level, for this trade delivery.
A supply chain schedule, specified at line level, for this trade delivery.
A supply (replenishment) schedule, specified at line level, for this trade delivery.
